## Exercise: Explore, Clean, and Wrangle Data

### Set up
```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

### Read data
```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
lobster_traps <- read_csv("../data/Lobster_Trap_Counts_All_Years_20210519.csv")
```

### Explore data
